title: How many learning disabilities can one possibly have? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess you can have a trillion. You can even label these disabilities as personality traits.... But I guess your question is more related to disabling disabilities, in which case, I guess you can also have a million of, but one, or none of them is too devastating to strike you out of the game. On the other hand, you can only have one disability, so deep, that its effects can be disastrous on the functionality of a person's life.
There is one primary disability. The inclination to surrender.
